flawed_nl_solution:
The sum of the weights of the 5 girls is 45 kg x 5 = <<45*5=225>>225 kg.
The sum of the weights of the 5 boys is 55 kg x 5 = <<55*5=275>>275 kg.
The sum of the weights of the ten students is 225 kg + 275 kg = <<225+275=5000>>5000 kg.
Hence, the average weight of those 10 students is 5000 kg/10 = <<5000/10=500>>500 kg.
#### 500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 5000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
